Reviews.Title: Don't buy.
Reviews.Author: ATM
Reviews.Content: The laptop worked for 2 hours and then the SSD died. I took it to repair and the guy told me that somebody opened it and replaced the 256 GB with a 128 GB SSD (which obviously was not even good because it died in 2 hours of normal use). If I could give it less than a star I would.

Reviews.Title: One word, awesome!
Reviews.Author: A. Yayalar
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent laptop. Top of the line computing experience. It's light, powerful, and visually stunning. Highly recommended for anyone interested in MacBook Air.

Reviews.Title: Not the latest version
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: this aint the latest version, the box of the latest version is totally white.... the i7 processor is 2.0 GHz not 1.8... thats the 2011 model...
